statements: SELECT * FROM supplier_information;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM supplier_information;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact_number FROM supplier_information WHERE supplier_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM supplier_information WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT supplier_name FROM supplier_information WHERE supplier_id > 2 ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM supplier_information WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM supplier_information WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
SELECT * FROM supplier_information WHERE supplier_location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact_number FROM supplier_information ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(supplier_id) AS supplier_count, supplier_location FROM supplier_information GROUP BY supplier_location HAVING supplier_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT name, location FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM cross_docking_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, order_date, delivery_date FROM cross_docking_orders WHERE status = 'Delivered';
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM cross_docking_orders GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING order_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT name, location FROM suppliers ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT supplier_id, name, location, contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM cross_docking_orders WHERE delivery_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY delivery_date ASC
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM cross_docking_orders GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING order_count > 3
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'New York';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT supplier_location, COUNT(*) AS total_suppliers FROM suppliers GROUP BY supplier_location;
SELECT * FROM cross_docking_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location LIKE '%California%';

SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM suppliers JOIN cross_docking_orders ON suppliers.supplier_id = cross_docking_orders.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING order_count > 5 ORDER BY order_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM cross_docking_orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY order_date;

SELECT product_id, product_name, SUM(order_items->>'quantity'::INT) AS total_quantity FROM cross_docking_orders, jsonb_array_elements(order_items) AS items(product) JOIN products ON items.product->>'id'::INT = products.product_id GROUP BY product_id, product_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50 ORDER BY product_price ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-04-30';
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, order_date FROM suppliers s JOIN orders o ON s.supplier_id = o.supplier_id JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id;

SELECT product_name, supplier_name, cross_docking_location FROM products p JOIN orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id JOIN suppliers s ON o.supplier_id = s.supplier_id JOIN cross_docking c ON o.order_id = c.order_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_location DESC;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name FROM products JOIN suppliers ON products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT order_id, order_quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, supplier_name FROM products JOIN suppliers ON products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.order_quantity FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM suppliers LEFT JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name;

SELECT customer_name, order_date, order_status FROM customers JOIN cross_docking ON customers.customer_id = cross_docking.customer_id JOIN orders ON orders.order_id = cross_docking.order_id WHERE order_status = 'pending' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
